    Function reference

    Main functions

    Load, process and visualize

    load_data()
    Models download/upload
    projections()
    Analysis of future projections
    climate_change_signal()
    Calculation of climate change signal
    trends()
    Analysis of long-term trends
    plotting()
    Visualize results

    Memory efficient

    Load and process in spatial chunks

    load_data_and_projections()
    Load data and apply projections in spatial chunks
    load_data_and_climate_change_signal()
    Load data and apply climate change signal in spatial chunks
    load_data_and_trends()
    Load data and apply trends in spatial chunks

    Utils

    Accessory functions

    C4R_to_CAVA()
    Converting C4R lists into CAVAanalytics list
    common_dates()
    Date selection
    ens_trends()
    Apply multivariate linear regression to a multimember grid
    make_raster()
    make a raster
    models_trends()
    Apply linear regression to each member of multimember grid
    thrs()
    Calculation of thresholds
    thrs_consec()
    Consecutive days
